summary: This document contains draft RSVP and reminder language from the FBI Victim Services Division for a victim briefing. It outlines logistical details including transportation, lodging reimbursement, security procedures, and identification requirements for attendees.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing
events.description: A briefing organized by the FBI Victim Services Division for victims, requiring government-issued identification and prohibiting cell phones in the briefing space.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division is organizing a briefing for victims with specific logistical arrangements.
Transportation and lodging will be arranged at no cost for those living more than 50 miles from the selected location, with mileage reimbursement available for those who drive.
The briefing will be held in a federal building, requiring government-issued identification and prohibiting cell phones in the briefing space.
Attendees must complete an 'RSVP Questionnaire' to provide detailed information for assistance.
A reminder was drafted to be sent one day before the briefing reiterating identification requirements and cell phone restrictions.
